item.title: The Celtic Society
item.description: We’re going to talk about the origins of English culture and literature in this page, right from the beginning. The first inhabitants of British Isles vere the Iberians, many centuries B.C. We say "B.C." (Before Christ) or "B.C.E" for events happened before the year 0, and instead "A.D." (Anno Domini) or "C.E." (Common Era) for events happened after the year 0. After the Iberians (our book - LitHub - doesn’t even talk about them!
